content.detailedDescription: It looks like a very bright star, slightly larger than jupitor moving slowly in a slight ziz zag motion. i have seen these things on several ocations some times they apear and disapear and apear again moving from one direction or another but this one went directly over dia airport from west to east, apearing aprox 20 degrees abouve the western horizon and disapearing at about 20 degrees above the eastern horizon.
content.summary: Bright object moving slowly with slight zig zag motion from west to east directly over dia airport.

content.detailedDescription:
On august 20, 2010, around 5:30 pm, i was checking out my video gear for another group ufo skywatch.  i was thinking about getting my older, unused camcorder equipment ready to be used if anyone at the skywatch wanted to use it.  and i also was thinking that my oldest camcorder, a sony trv-65 model, had some kind of infrared, night mode.  it does and it is called ���������nightshot��������� mode.  i had recently read some new information about ufo photography in j. chisholm���������s photography methods for the ufo hunter, and he had a section about near infrared, night photography for video shooting of ufos.

after getting out the old trv-65, i proceeded to my deck out back to test it.  i intended to videotape the backyard trees, roofline, and sky with the sony in regular and nightshot mode.  while doing this with various levels of zooming in and out and turning the camcorder back and forth from regular to nightshot mode, i was greatly surprised to see a white blob come into the frame from the left while i was zoomed in to maximum extent.  it was so startling that i naturally started following the object as it sped along in the sky under some high clouds.  i managed to keep it in the frame the whole time it was visible till it moved along into a bank of dense white clouds.  this ended up lasting only eight seconds.

view the video at [link moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Nightshot video of fuzzy, white, ball-like ufo speeding in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside just to get some fresh air & look at the stars and i noticed one was extremely bright. well, then i noticed it was moving slightly. i kept watching and it didn't move like anything i've ever observed before -- planes go overhead often & even helicopters (some planes went by while this thing was around, & it was always still as they went by then started moving again once they were out of sight.)

as far as the locomotion goes, it could be absolutely still, or in constant motion, it most often moved in small increments but sometimes crossed more distance and often circled back on itself almost like it was covering a grid or something?  i called my sister outside and she brought a couple of pairs of crappy little binoculars we have, so we were able to get a little closer look. at times it was almost like an orb, then at others perhaps comprised of smaller lights in an almost triangular shape. often, there were 'arms' or offshoots of light or that would have a light on the end. 

with this closer look, we could also see it was never perfectly still even tho it appeared so with the naked eye. it was in constant motion - faster than anything man-made could possibly be in my opinion. at times it was almost like it was drawing shapes in the sky in such rapid movements we could almost see the circles & marks it made for a split second inscribed in light before our eyes caught up & they faded away. it was almost like it was dancing, lol. as strange as it was, it was beautiful. all the shifting, moving, lights that mostly appeared white, but sometimes i would catch hints of blues, greens, & reds in the mix. i'm very curious what it could be, because honestly i've never heard of any ufo that behaved in quite this way...  

we'll definitely be looking up to the sky tonight as well for any signs of anything unusual, just in case.  unfortunately we can't seem to get pictures as our digital camera does not like to work in dark lighting. : (
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.shape: Chevron,   Circle,   Cross,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Triangle,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Hovering directly over our house for at least 3 hours.

content.detailedDescription:
The object is not an un-common object to be witnessed in the night sky. they can be witnessed... as long as you are intent on seeing them. i have researched every avenue for confirmation and validation of these objects. the best i can conclude... is that the government will not show any valid evidence of radar confirmation, nor will they address their localized aerial presense... unconditionally. transparency and validation will only be achieved by means of mass evidence gathering and demand.

keep your eyes and cameras to the sky!

[name removed], tn
content.summary: Unknown  atmospheric bioform

content.detailedDescription: I was passenger in a car driving from bristol to reading and noticed an object that was apparently very white in colour. it did not seem luminous.It was in bright sunshine.There was light patchy, fluffy, cumulus cloud just below it and this could be seen passing by with the wind below the object. although we were driving east, me and my sister witnessed this object which appeared to be static at what i would say was around 10,000 feet perhaps lower? at that height the object must have been about the size of a 737. my immediate thoughts were it must be a tethered balloon although this was way high and would have been a danger to other aircraft. the visibility was so good that i am certain there was no tether. the shape was unlike a blimp or airship and there was no motion that would be consistent, particularly in the strong sw wind. it did not bob or rotate or move with the crosswind. the shape was like a squished as in flattened figure of eight. lying on its side. so nearly cigar shaped but with a dip in the middle. we watched it as long as our eyes could focus on it from very close to what must have been about 3 miles away. i was frustrated i could not just pull over and watch it but we were on the motorway. i have seen a lot of aircraft in my time but this was odd. however it did not do any freaky manoeuvres, it was static.
content.summary: White object seen apparently static at approx 10,000 ft . broad daylight.

content.detailedDescription:
On august 23rd 2010 at approximately 2140hrs, i ask my wife if she would like to go for a drive. it took us approximatley 10 minutes to get dressed and start the car. we decided to go for gas in raytown at 87th street. after paying for gas, i walked over and began to pump my gas.  while pumping i began to look around the sky and noticed in a distance a brightly illuminated star that hung low in the sky.  i brought it to my wife's attention and suggested that we drive toward it. first we drove toward overland park kansas and noticed that the star appeared to be moving. so we ajusted our direction to the south toward butler mo. as we got to butler, we notice that the star appeared to be a bit north and west of our current position.
 
 so we again changed direction. now driving toward belton. once we got to 166th street we turned east. while driving on 166th we stopped and pulled over because we noticed that the star was now dimming, and it was now comming in our direction. it seemed to have spotted us some how. while we sat there party on the sholder and half of my car still in the street this very large craft flew directly overhead turning it's extremely bright light completely off.  watching it fly over i marveled at how large it was.  this night there was a full moon and i could see that it was trianglular in shape.  as it was flying south now headed toward butler fast.
  we continued to keep our eyes on it as it turned its bright star like light back on and tried to drive in it direction again. needless to say we couldn't catch it again. this thing just sits in mid air for hours (atleast until we noticed it and began to drive toward it) what it was i couldn't tell you but it was but it wasn't a conventional air craft. i'v never seen anything this big! i know we have b2 bomber2 in the area, but this was'nt that. i seen the b2 up close and this thing was 3 to 4 times as large.  for those of you who saw it in overland park, i'm sure that this is not the first time anyone has noticed it. i've noticed it from raytown mo, but this was the first time i decided to drive toward it to see what it was. i seriously think that perhaps now is the time to report any and all sightings. i'm not trying to panic anyone, but there is something really serious going on. i've got more strange pictures and videos than i really care to have.  i hope that all (and i do mean all) these creatures are here for peaceful purposes. i should also mention that i was taking pictures of the moon the night before and i notice that there is something there that was'nt there before. atleast not in any prior pictures that i have taken.  someone else out there knows whats happening without speculation and is either unwilling or unable to comment on these phenomena at this time.  but mark my words, that day is comming!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Large triangluar craft with extremely bright light front or center, blue lights at the rear.

content.detailedDescription:
I was up at the top of mt. hamilton in san jose with a friend taking some pictures of the night sky.  we were looking to get photos of saturn and mercury.  my friend had a constellation program on his phone that he pointed to the sky to find where we should look.  while he was trying to set up the program we noticed a big bright star over the flight path in san jose.  we looked at his phone to program, looked up and it was gone.  we thought it must have been a plane.  about 10 minutes later, my friend noticed a big bright "star" in the trees to the right and in front of the observatory.  he then noticed it was moving.  we walked out from behind the tree to look at the light in the clear and noticed then that the object was hovering from side to side in the same place/same level.  it then slightly and smoothly moved up, then came back down to its original location and continued to move from side to side.  you can see this in the attached photo 6981.  although you can not see it moving, you can tell when you magnify the picture that it is not a star and not a plane.

in addition to this... when we arrived at the top of the hill before noticing the light object, i felt a presence to my right while exiting the car.  i continued to feel the presence while on the hill side, but did not see anything.  the next day, my friend sent me some of the pictures he took of me standing on the edge of the cliff looking out into the valley.  in photo 6989 attached, you will see an orb with what looks like a blue light in the shape of a body standing in front of me to my right.  it looks like the shape is mirroring the way i am standing.

i was not afraid and felt safe the entire time.  the light object was still hovering right in front of the observatory to our left when we departed 20-30 mins later.  it was the first time i had ever seen anything like that and it was amazing :)
content.summary: Bright ball of white light hovering side to side.

content.detailedDescription: Went outside in my front yard to look at the stars looked over the treeline and saw a orange starlike ufo that was pulsing going above the treeline then it would just dissappear i thought it was a plane but it wasnt moving and it was orange and just above the treeline i was scared cause it looked like it was just staring at me then it was just gone in an instant
content.summary: It looked like a orange star that was pulsing then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
While visiting my in-laws at their cabin on oyster bay, i was out riding a kayak in lake charlevoix in the early evening. i had crossed the north arm of lake charlevoix almost to the entrance to pine river, which exits into round lake, and then lake michigan. when i was about 100 yards from the old train trestle bridge abutments that flank the entrance to pine river.

i turned the kayak south to head back directly to oyster bay. it was a lovely evening, about 7:30 p.M., clear and warm, with little cloud cover. the lake was a bit rough, with maybe 1 to 1.5 foot swells, but no white caps. stiff wind from the west, i think, though i am no expert.

as i turned, i noticed a large pinkish-silver sphere low over the trees way south near what i guessed was ironton but not as far south at east jordan. it just floated there. i thought at first it was a hot air balloon giving rides at a fair, but i watched it over 30 minutes it took me to row back to oyster bay, and although it appeared to shift location slightly, it never went up for down much. in order to try to place the object, i noted that if i held my hand at arm's length with my finger at the horizon of the lake, the sphere was about my index finger's width above the horizon and seemed to be floating slightly to the left of the narrow center portion of lake charlevoix. it could have been father south than ironton, but since i'm no sure how big it was, i'm not sure how far south it floated. i could block my view of the sphere with my index finger but not by much. it looked big. 

it was a solid, pink-silver color, not with any graphics like you would expect on a hot-air balloon. i tried and tried to spot a gondola, but could not see anything hanging below it. i wondered if it could be a coast guard weather balloon, because i know there is a coast guard station in charlevoix. but if the sphere was tethered to a boat, i could not see it. anyway, it was a clean sphere, not an upside down teardrop shape like you would expect to see in a weather balloon. it was actually rather beautiful, like a plain little pink moon.

as i paddled, i kept expecting it to disappear or to move. there were maybe two or three power boats visible on the lake. none were remotely close to me, so although i wanted to hail a boat to see if anyone could confirm my sighting, i couldn't. surely someone else must have noticed this thing. i raced back to the bay in hopes of getting a better look with my binoculars, but i lost sight of the sphere behind the tree line there as i rounded the point going into the bay. i even climbed onto the roof of the cabin to see if i could spot it from there. but it was still below the tree line, and by then it was getting dark, so i gave up. it occurred to me later in bed that i should have called the cg in charlevoix to ask what it was or to call the local police to see whether they knew, but the next morning it seemed like it would be too silly to do so and i would just be laughed off as a kook.

i have no idea what the sphere was, and i would be grateful to anyone who could tell me if it was merely a mundane object or some weather phenomenon. someone else had to have seen it.
content.summary: Saw large sphere low over south arm of lake charlevoix.

content.detailedDescription:
Two or maybe the same ufo flies over chicago for 10 minutes on 8/23/10 starting first at 4:24 pm cdt then reappearing at 4:30 pm flying in same noiseless slow pattern. the ufo was a slow moving bright star-like orb that shimmered like a diamond in the sun's light.

i was in my backyard watching the sky. i have been filming this ufo phenomenon frequently for a year now. on mon 8/23 a bright star first appeared east over downtown then slowly moved in a west south west direction. i filmed as if flew over for five minutes. then a second bright ufo orb appeared 1 minute later in the same spot it started and flew the same 5 minute long flight pattern but this time directly over my head. it then disappeared. 

sorry the video isnt great but ok it gets blurry and out of focus at times during the 10 minutes it leisurely flew across the sky but i wanted to report it because there were other similar reports of this on same date. 

not sure what these ufos are but they seem to be consistently over the same part of the sky in chicago. my youtube channel has similar recorded objects in the same part of the sky on different dates. not sure what it means but they are fun to watch. thanks for reading. peace

watch 10 minute video at (link moved to additional evidence section below--sgonzalez/cms).
content.summary: Shimmering daytime ufo slowly flies over chicago 10 min hd video.

content.detailedDescription: I am writing this on behalf of my daughters: there were three girls involved in the sighting: my daughters which are 14 and 11 and there friend who is 12.  they think the whole idea of ufo's are silly and have little to no knowledge on the subject.  we were leaving the swimming pool and walking to the celler doors which are about 10 feet away.  it was around 9 pm and was almost dark.  we noticed a bright light on the ground in the middle of the yard and looked up.  there were four really bright lights just hovering there, they were about the size of basketballs.  there were three outer lights that formed a triangle and one in the middle.  the lights were very bright and white; we could not make out any details of a plan, ships, etc...  my sister handed me the digital camera (we had been taking underwater pictures in the pool, so we had the camera with us) and we took four pictures.  there was no sound except for some kind if wishing noise when it took off.  i'm not sure how long it hovered, seconds.  then it slowly drifted across the backyard toward the woods and then took off and was gone.  as it took off it turned to the left and seemed to leave a trail of light for just a few seconds.  we were very scared and are not sure what it was.
content.summary: Triangle of lights over swimming pool.

content.detailedDescription: I decided to go outside and lay down on my picnic table and look up at the stars like i normally do every so often.  i've been doing it for years in hopes of seeing something.  all these years, i've seen satellites, meteor showers and whatnot, but tonight was different.  i was looking up and it happened so fast but, what looked like two bright balls of light or whatever seemed to just kinda appear out of nowhere and fly south of where i was looking up at.  they were extremely high up, what appeared to be much, much higher than any plane that i've ever seen but possibly closer than a satellite but can't say for certain.  anyway, it was like, the second they appeared, they were already flying at thousands of miles per hour.  there were two of them flying side by side at the exact same speed flying from where they appeared and flew south.  and i mean, these things were hauling ass!!!  only in the view of the sky i could see for a out 5-7 seconds or so but i have to say, it was definitely one of the strangest things i've ever seen looking into the night sky.  would love to know if anyone else saw the same thing.
content.summary: Two bright lights streaming across sky together

content.detailedDescription:
My mom and i were staring up at the sky in our backyard watching planes and i saw a bright circular light that looked like a shooting star, but it was moving slower than a shooting star, but faster than an airplane. the light was constant, it was not blinking, and there were no other lights around it. it was moving in an easterly direction and appeared to be rising up since the light was getting smaller and smaller. when the light was above the moon, i could not find it at all. about 30 seconds later i saw it moving in a westerly direction, it was still small and not pulsating, eventually i lost sight of it since it flew too far away for me to see.
i checked the satellite trackers and there's nothing i could find going over the area and the light was nothing like the other airplanes in the sky. i'm pretty darn excited.
content.summary: Bright circular light that got smaller and then made 120 degree turn

content.detailedDescription: Was out in back yard watching stars. started walking back to house but turned around for one last look and thats when i saw the object coming straight towards me about 80 ft. above me. was shaped like a bell with amber color on top, blue in the middle and white on the bottom. looked to be about 6 to 7 ft. wide and about 8 ft. tall, as bright as could be. i stood there watching this amazing object because i didn't want to miss any part of this. it kept coming right towards me then dipped down a bit and must of noticed me and that's when it disappeared. from as bight as could be to nothing. it just disappeared. it came from the south behind our house where the skagit river is only about 5 blocks away from our house. i was in awe, excited and in wonder and shock. but when it kept coming straight towards me i became a little scared. but i was not going to move because this was a once in a life time thing to see. i became very upset and mad because it had diappeared. i wanted to see the whole thing fly over me.I have heard of uso's and the skagit river is only 5 blocks from our house. i know that sounds a little far fetched but you never know. it was the best experience of my life concerning  ufo's. i will never forget it! oh yes ,when i first noticed it i had no idea what it was.
content.summary: Colored bell shaped object about 80 ft. above. got very close to me  then must of noticed me and disappeared. coming directly at me.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my backyard in noe valley district in san francisco around 12:30am on june 10, 2010 and i was looking around at the garden.  sometimes i go out there at night and relax in the garden so this was normal for me. i was completely involved in looking down at the ground and my plants when something caught my eye in the sky to the south of me.  i looked up and saw a large group of around ten dimly glowing red lights forming an uneven "v" pattern in the sky.  when i say "uneven", i mean that they formed a v shape, but one side of the v extended out farther than the other. picture like a check mark shape with the longer side on the right. it was completely silent and glided across the night sky from east to west. it didn't appear to be moving very quickly and i was confused because at first i just assumed it was the underside of a plane.  i remember thinking that the plane i was looking at was in pretty crappy condition because its lights were burnt out on one end causing it to have a check mark shape instead of a full v. then i realized it was not making any noise, and i started to get chills down my spine because i was quickly realizing that it was not a plane. i couldn't tell how high up in the sky it was, but i could tell that if it was a plane, it would have to be flying extremely low to be as wide as it was. it also most definitely would make loud noise. i felt like the floor fell out from under me.  then, as i was fighting to accept what i was seeing, something amazing happened to make me know without a doubt that what i was seeing was extraterrestrial. as the formation of lights slowly glided across the sky, the portion of lights which created the uneven, extended part of the v broke off from the rest of the lights. it spun rapidly in clockwise circles, shot off into space, and was gone.  what now remained in the sky was a normal even "v" configuration of lights which had slowed its movement in the sky above me. then it faded away and was gone.  the glowing reddish orange lights just faded away, just like when you turn off a light on a dimmer switch slowly. the whole event lasted about 10 seconds.

i stood there completely blown away. i am not a ufo nut or even ever think about the subject. this makes me change my perspective on a lot of different things in my life. i now know that we are not alone and there is at least one far more advanced species of life than us. i kind of feel privileged to have seen this.
content.summary: V shaped formation of reddish orange lights seen gliding over san francisco, ca 6/10/10.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south to my home from a friend's house in kearney, nebraska and noticed a bright red star-like object between the moon and a very bright star/planet to the west. the object was the largest star-like object in the sky. it was bright red. i pulled off the street and called my friend to see if he would confirm what i was seeing. as he was starting to go outside, it turned white then moved to the east. as it moved it shrunk and dissappeared. it had been stationary. i have never seen anything like it and i am a somewhat regular star gazer. there were no clouds in the sky and i noticed it immediately when i started heading south. at first, i thought it was a star or planet, but it seemed too red. there was no flashing like a plane or helicopter. i have considered whether it might be a meteor or something, but it went from being stationary to moving to the east. i don't know what would cause a trajectory change like that if it was a meteor. i was amazed!
content.summary: Stationary right red star-like object in the southern sky that changed color then moved, shrunk then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving my local supermarket and heading home. it was around 9:30 pm. after about a mile on a freeway i turned off onto a secondary road. taking a right and then an immediate left. as i turned right i saw a car in front of me going very slow. i then saw an object in the sky straight ahead of me. i appeared very bright red in color or orangish in the center and shimmering around the edges. i thought it might be a bright star or planet at first. it was bigger than either and it was closer and brighter. im guessing it was around 10,000 feet. big though! i pulled off of the side of the road and pulled out my iphone. i took a couple of pictures however i was in a panic and could not get a zoom in the shot. while taking 2 pictures one other car approached and saw the object as well. they saw me taking pictures and asked..What is that in the sky? i replied i have no idea its why i pulled off the road! we observed the object for a minute or so, and i was convinced it might have been a star that was being refracted throught the atmosphere. im an aviation enthusiast and i have alot of experience viewing aircraft night or day. this was no aircraft! all of a sudden the outer lights dissapeared. there was a single reddish to orange light left and it went straight up into the sky quickly until the light got smaller and smaller then finally dissapeared completely!After downloading the pictures from my phone and i zoomed in on the object it appears triangular.. amazing. i am curious if you recieve anyother reprts from charleston, wv. it should have been visible to alot of people in the city as i was just in the suburb and it was very bright. i was shaking driving home and i live just a few miles away. i have walked out and looking the sky from my home but no other sightings tonight. one you open the attachments..Zoom in to see what i think is a triangle shaped object.

*(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez/cms.
content.summary: Observed a bright shimmering object above me after turning on a side road.

content.detailedDescription: Went outside at approx 11pm and saw what appeared to be a very bright star in the eastern direction of the sky. it was very bright and i stared at it for some time assuming it was a really high plane or helicopter, and i would see it moving. at no point did it move so i then stared at it more and decided it must be a very bright star, much brighter than anything i have ever seen before. i stared at it for a good 15 minutes and it looked like a star only much brighter. it had different colors and sparkled the way a star does, maybe a bit more. as stated before it did not move at all in the 15 minutes i was staring at it. at this time i went in and decided to try and find out what star it was. after about 10 minutes i had read that sirius was the brightest star and decided that was probably what i had been looking at. went back outside.... and whatever it was, was gone.  the only thing that could stay in the sky motionless like that is a helicopter, and i stared at it for a long time and i am possitive it was not a helicopter. i am possitive that i did not loose the star or anything also. who knows, probably nothing, but it was really creepy. wondering if anyone else saw this.
content.summary: Star that disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Tonight i saw 3 of them in 20 minute period all emanating out of lyra constellation and 2 of them passing through casiopea constellation from lyra.  the 3rd path was from lyra to left of casiopea.  i can see these star like objects any clear night within about 15 minutes or so whenever i want.  i have even showed friends and family anytime it was clear and it only takes about 15 minutes for them to "show up". they travel in a straight line and seem to come from the area i concentrate on when i look for them and i have even predicted thier flight paths to people before them appear. i have a $250 pair of zoom binoculars and these things are just balls of light. no anti-collision lights or other markings or shape at all. some have "winked as well" like an iridium flare but i dont believe these things are satellites as you dont usually see up to 8 an hour around same area. do you? i can usually view them for a couple of minutes until they go out of sight and some just dissapear or fade out. they move at various speeds usually about the speed of a plane, some faster and some slower. i have been watching the skies for 20 years and can tell what is what in the sky and these are not planes. satellites maybe, but i can never find them on heavens above satellite tracking website so what the heck are they.  i know they exist its just a matter of who they are and what do they want. if mufon contacts me i can show them any night they want, i found them pretty quick on any clear night. thanks and keep watching everyone, i'm sure something cool is gonna happen soon.  godspeed!!
content.summary: Star like objects almost any clear night sometimes up to 8 an hour

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on my way home from work and a large red object with a large orange/yellow flashing light in the center appeared over the western horizon.  the sheer excitement of seeing such an object took my attention off the road, so i had to stop the car.  i had absolutely no idea what it might have been, as i had never seen anything like it in the past.  my main reaction during the sighting was utter amazement.  i couldn't help myself from shouting "what the hell is that thing?!" out loud.  it was utterly bizarre.

 i watched it fly in a zigzag pattern across the sky-- it took about two minutes for the object to disappear over the eastern horizon.  it appeared to be flying much higher in the sky by the time it had disappeared.
content.summary: Red circle with orange flashing light in center

content.detailedDescription:
I took photos of mt. rainier from the scenic view point on highway 12 west on july 18 2010 at 1241 hours, which is a usual practice for me when i drive over white pass to go fishing. i use the date time stamp on my photos so i know exactly when i have taken the pictures. my camera is a canon powershot sx120 with 10x zoom and is 10 mega pixels. i was using the auto focus at the time of the photos.

i don't always get around to downloading my photos right away and today august 22 2010, i finally downloaded the photos stored on my camera. two of the photos that i had taken within the same minute show an object (not visible to me at the time i was taking the photo and appears as a dot on  photo) just north (right side in photos) of mt. rainier. a third photo within the same minute shows that the object is no longer visible. i first thought that it was a smudge on my screen until i zoomed in the photo and can see a solid object. i researched sightings in the area for july 2010 from the mufon ufo tracker map and saw that there were numerous sightings and one specifically mentioned mt. rainier. i do not know for sure what this is but i would like to submit the three photos for review.
content.summary: Two toned - bright on top /dark on bottom oval or round in shape.

content.detailedDescription: It was very early in the morning  shortly after 5 a.M. and i was getting ready for work so i let the new dog out to potty. when i opened  up the front door in the sky to the left of me was a strange very out of place object. it was what appeared to be two very large fireball orange glowing almost burning from within  spheres just gliding across the sky. the larger sphere was leading and a smaller one seems  attached or tethered to the larger one at the center. they both seemed to have an aura field around them that glowed a lighter shade of pale orange.  they emitted no sound at all. i watched as they floated into a cloud bank and had to leave to get to work on time. i would estimate the size to be  around that of which if you held your arm out the larger would be  between a  and half dollar and the smaller one about the size of a dime.
content.summary: Two orange fireballs seemingly tethered at the center gliding across sky. largest ball leading and smaller one seemed to leave trail like a comet. no sound whatsoever.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my backyard facing east and saw a bright reddish christmas tree/triangle like silent & unmoving object in the sky. the moon was nearly full and quite bright.  the stars/planets were dimmed by the brightness of the moon but not this object. also there seemed to be a twinkling effect to the light from the object; i could not identify the shape of the discreet light sources in the triangle. i would say the predominant color of the light emanating from the object  had an overall reddish tint but frankly i'm not great with colors.

the object was visually well above the tree line. if i named an altitude i'd only be guessing. the moon seemed (in comparison to the overall sky) to be the size of a dime and the triangle of lights seemed to be as large as the moon which made me think it was not a natural object.

i watched it off and on for about fifteen minutes right up until about midnight. it neither moved nor changed in brightness, shape or color. it also did not make any noise the entire time.

also when i say christmas tree or triangle i do not mean to say i saw an integrated body or skin to the object. i just saw lights in a roughly triangular pattern.
content.summary: Reddish unmoving chrismas tree/triangle like object in sky at night.

content.detailedDescription: As you can see in the picture, it was raining.  just playing around with my new camera experimenting with low light pictures.  i'm 99% positive it's a relflection from a drop of water.  but, i was tucked back in the garage as i didn't want to get my camera wet, and the rain/wind was blowing away from me.  just for the hell of it, i'm submitting it to you to confirm.  i saw nothing when i took the photo, just noticed it when i down loaded to the computer.
content.summary: Trying out my new camera

content.detailedDescription: Actually on thurs. 8/19/10 in the west from my home there was a hovering boomerang shaped light in the sky, brighter than any i have seen it was about 9:45pm. i watched it for about 1 hour and it just hovered. i came back outside at about 11pm and it was gone.  the next night i seen the same thing but only now it was east of me at about the same time. i watched it for only about 30 minutes this time. i came back out about 1 hour later and it was gone.  today i am curious about this light so i go back outside at about the same time and not only did i see the light again..I see it both to the east and west of me. it seems miles away but i can tell it hovers from side to side. the one to the west this time is blinking and the one to the east is not, but none the less i can tell these are not stars. i am going back out right now to see if it is still there.....Yes they are both still there, however the one to the east is a lot closer than previous and now looks a little disc shaped and the one to the west is farther away. i just was standing in my front yard watching this because they are so bright and odd i seen the same thing in hemet, ca when i lived there over 1 yr ago. i am starting to wonder if i am being watched from afar. if i am not someone is.  i just hope it is some military experiment or something. my husband seen it also and we both think it is strange. this is not airplanes. they are far away but if i can see it from that far away it has to be huge. it looks like airplane pass under and aroung and even above these objects. i wish my camera worked but it is broke so i can't include pictures but if you come into my house area and look around you will see a ufo about 9:45 to after 11pm.
content.summary: Hovering ufo three days in a row.

content.detailedDescription: My roommate and i decided to go to the nederland high school track and walk around to get some exercise. it was evening, the sun was setting. my roommate and i were talking when i noticed a bright object in the sky. thinking it was a plane or some other well known cause i ignored it. moments later i realized the object was gone. i told my roommate about it who remained skeptical. about 5 to maybe 10 minutes later the object reappeared in another part of the sky, much brighter. my roommate then noticed the object. even though it was bright the setting sun seemed to reflect off it. then without warning the object disappeared once more. my roommate and i contemplated as to what it could be. then the object appeared once more in another area of the sky. there were other people at the track at the time and i'm sure my roommate and i weren't the only ones to have witnessed this object. after the third time the object didn't return but several moments later several jets flew in the vicinity of where the object was.
content.summary: Bright object going disappearing and reappearing throughout the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was feeding my 7 month old son "k" at home, when from nowhere we suddenly heard the thunderous roar of military choppers near our house. i went out to see what the commotion was and then went to get my camera (i always film helicopters of the police/military type to see what appears in the pics later). the choppers were about 2 streets away (300 yards) from my house. however when i started taking photos of the heli's one of them flew directly above our home! it was very intimidating to say the least. my girlfriend gemma suggested that the chopper pilots may have seen my camera flash and for some reason become annoyed by it. perhaps they dont appreciate been photographed. i took several photos and many of them had 'unknown quantities' in the frame. the one photo in particular though (attached) is astounding, it appears to show a ufo materialising! i dont know what to make of it. please check it out and let me know what you think. there was lots of dogs barking, which ive mentioned has happened before in similar episodes/circumstances. regards [name deleted/cms/tg], wordsley, england.
content.summary: Helicopters chasing ufos for over 10 mins. i took photos and the chopper intimidated me by hovering very low over my house!

content.detailedDescription: I awok eat 3.15am as my yougest son was crying for a milk, after this i could not sleep so decided to stand at my window and have a cigarette, as i was standing there i saw two planes fly over from north to south, just after the second one passed  bright white glowing light passed from south to north over my house, i watched it trying to determine what it was, it was definitely inside our atmosphere as it was lower than the two planes had been, it was quite fast moving but not fast enough that i lost site of it quickly, i watched it on it's way when it turned and started heading north-west. i was only able to watch it for 5 minutes as it then disappeared behind the houses and trees.
content.summary: Bright white light.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dog at around 10.15 on saturday morning in old town, clapham common and we were less than five minutes from home. i love living under the gatwick flight path because i get to watch planes every day. ever since i was child i have always looked up. i was watching the new boeing a380 with absolute delight, when i saw what i thought was another plane much higher and much farther away. i looked at it for a long time and decided that i couldn't see any wings or tail, and of course i had this rather large boeing to compare it to. in fact, it had the shape of a cigar, it seemed to be white i did not see windows. i did my best to track it using the a380 as it continued on its route. i nearly lost it in the clouds and whilst searching it for it, i spotted a second object, it seemed to be similar to the first but was too far away for me to establish a shape. the first object came back into view and the second disappeared into the clouds.

just as the a380 disappeared from sight in the direction of clapham junction and gatwick, i stopped a passer-by and asked her opinion, she took a while to find where i pointed but she confirmed that she saw both objects and that she didnt know what they were and continued on her way. what nailed it for me, was that at the start both plane and object were headed south but now the object had moved back and was headed north and then i lost sight of it.

i'll be honest i am 38 and have been staring up at the sky since i was a child, i really love planes, and i had never seen anything but planes in the sky up until today, today, i saw something else.
content.summary: Saw 2 ufos.

content.detailedDescription:
On 08/20/2010 at approximately 2153 hours my wife came into the house and begged me to get into the car. she told me that she and a friend *(name deleted--sgonzalez/cms) had just seen a ufo over mcclusky and she wanted me to see it. we started to drive west of town and she pointed out the light in the sky to the west. by this time it was now 20 or more miles away and i could just see the light. we kept driving west. about 2 miles out of town i spotted deputy sheriff **(name deleted--sgonzalez/cms) and we stopped and i asked him to get out of the vehicle and i pointed to where the light was but, he stated that he could not see it. i explained that the light had just come over mcclusky and was now west of here. i requested that he call mclean county and see if anyone over there had gotten any reports. i don���t think that he believed me, so it will be interesting to see if he called or not. i returned home called the assistant state director dale brown and wrote this report. 

my wife ***(name deleted--sgonzalez/cms) stated that at approximately 2130 hours she received a call from *(name deleted--sgonzalez/cms) asking her to drive her to her mother���s house. ***(name deleted--sgonzalez/cms) was on her way out to the union where *(name deleted--sgonzalez/cms) worked, when she looked up and noticed an orange colored large light with silver glitter appearance in the sky. she described it as larger than a golf ball at arms length and it was approximately between 60 and 100 feet off of the ground. it was traveling at a slow rate of speed and was headed in a northwest direction. ***(name deleted--sgonzalez/cms) first instinct was to get me so i could see it. she picked up *(name deleted--sgonzalez/cms)  and the light was now more in the north and seemed to have stopped. she showed her the light and said look at the ufo. *(name deleted) saw the object and said they are coming to get me. ***(name deleted) dropped off *(name deleted) and raced home to get me. i made note of the time as 2153 hours when i got into the car. when i first saw the light, it was south of the last position ***(name deleted) and *(name deleted) saw it at, and was much farther away. to me it appeared as a small red light about 3 inches above the horizon, just south of the farthest point of highway 200, where we had stopped. i am estimating that the light was approximately 20 miles away at that time.
content.summary: Orange light with glitter, traveling at slow speed approx 100 ft off the ground. stopped changed direction.
